Blog.post: this time, i really am VERY AFRAID.... i really don't know my work at all... i think i'm better off dead...

I see your face in every crowd I hear your laughter in every conversation I long for your sweet smile. How i wish a rainbow would appear, to bridge these thousand miles between us. Will you cross the distance for me? Will you come back for me? When the clock strikes midnight, Every chime hammers in the fact that you're not here. As i look into the glittering night, I joined the stars and found your smile in the sky. In my arms is where you belong, Yet you are where my hands can't reach. Are you alone? Are you sad? Are you thinking of me? Are you safe? Are you happy? Are you missing me? Here in my room, the fan slowly stirs the midnight air, Just like thoughts of you stir my emotions. In my dreams, we'll meet. And til the intrusive morning comes, We'll dance together, my love.

its a relative thing, really... if you start ur day early, you feel time passes more slowly, if you start it late, time passes very quickly. ok, i think i have gone mad from attempting to study, i love my dad for being so understanding and supportive. anione out there actually reading this? blogging is like an excuse for me to slack and use the computer. jane: why you drink so much sprite? mum: yah lor, u know 1can is equivalent to 10 bowls of rice? me:hmm.. i have eaten almost 30 bowls todae then something mean i did yesterdae. my sister is sick lah, so her bf came over. so she was lying on his legs, and he pulled a chair to stretch his legs lah, so he also fell asleep. i went down to get sprite, and decided to play a prank on him. i put the ice chilled-just-out-of-the-fridge can against his toe. -waits- no reaction. so i put on the other big toe(different foot) and still, no reaction. suddenly my fan went cling and i thot he would wake up..but no! after 4 secs! he opens his eyes wide and stares at his frozen toe in disbelief. haha... i was laughing like siao already and he said: "you are dam horrible ..." hahha, i feel so mean....
haiz, i thot my sis had it! turns out none of them have it... now, its gone, duno where... haiz

haiz... i wonder if i took the right combi, but its too late to do anithing now. how? cant save myself.. really loathe history now... its sux, dun want to understand it at all.... been trying to study my hist, yet been sleeping alot... duno how i am going to ans to everyone - Bala, Thompson, my parents.... why am i taking hist?? i feel like i'm dying... and my stomach feels damn unwell, been eating ALOT! like snacking all day... duno how to survive... some one save me pls... i sound damn paranoid and pathetic, i know... forgive me...
urlLink chubby! urlLink

hmm, so i have gotten over some things. sometimes i let my emotions rule me and i really hate it when i reflect back and think why i acted in that way. isnt it nice if i could give up everything, pursue all my dreams, travel the world... without having to worry abt anything?... yet i knoe i have my responsibilities, i cant just leave, things arnt supposed to work this way. "I know you're supposed to get hit by an arrow and all, but the rest of it isnt supposed to hurt so much." - a 8yr old boy on love. so sweet, yet he's too young to understand that love isnt that simple. you go thru much more than that. Tears, joy, laughter, quarrels, heartaches. i'm not in ani position to comment, but i know that it can be a v.wonderful thing. I try hard to make sure i control overthing, yet maybe i'm not that strong... maybe this sheds me in a different light form what u know me as.... *evil eyes*

why am i doing this quiz when millions of others are going to get the same results as me? its quite dumb, cause how can so many ppl have the same character as me... C major - the simplest key. You are content with where you are now, you have what you need. Some people are happy in C major, but it is up to you to decide to push yourself further if you want more from your life. urlLink what key signature are you? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla

hmm... since i woke up until now, i have been eating non stop, first digestive biscuits with chocolate, then cheese flavoured wang wang.... well its only been 3hrs since i woke which means that in this short span of time, i have snacked quite alot. i listen to my norah jones CD, even though i know it makes me sleepy, and i lie down to study, knowing that i will fall asleep... hows that?! concentration is really bad and i cant get anithing in... i dun even want to start on hist...
urlLink guess who? urlLink who's that fat boy? haha~ click on the picture to reveal!

urlLink sun rise from ron's hse urlLink isnt it nice? it makes you calm, relaxed, as if taking all the tension away from you... the wonderful works that God creates, are for all to see, yet many appreciate the beauty w/o giving credit to its maker...

urlLink zhengfu and me! urlLink its the hols and i am rejecting almost every request to go out. only for those i cant decline ie.Amanda's bdae. well, PW sux big time... i did not reliase until i had so many things to type and settle(minutes, research, summary.) yup, but i'm sure i can do it! being a slacker, and the last minute study-er that i am, i have practically no time to finish all my work. The most neglected sunbject happens to be hist, but i cant be bothered abt that now. I hope i pass my maths and econs... esp math! or i'll be letting my tutor down. he has been very lenient with me, cause he thinks i will do my work, yet i always manage to hide it from him. somehow i'm glad i'm not attached. i mean if i were, it'd be totally time consuming and i dun think i am ready to commit. can you imagine how you'd be obliged to call, meet up, be nice, caring....... i dun think thats me. cause i'm someone who keeps alot of things to myself. like i'm quite a loner and i'd like my partner to be proactive. meaning he has to love me more that i love him. which is unhealthy for a relationship. so i've digressed, i think i'll be dead shocked at my JCT results. not to forget, my report to get me back to training!!! haven written it at all.... i miss hanging out with the gang. zf, ss, py, jason, ws! no one to tease abt being fat... haiz.... if anyone's wondering why i write using the pen name Zhengyu, its cause i've gotten quite used to it as my nickname le....
Click on the picture for a clear big picture! urlLink sijie and fu-mei urlLink urlLink Zhengfu! shagged after sailing camp urlLink

everyone you meet could be fighting a harder battle than yours. isnt it mean how we always think that we have the right to flare up at ppl? maybe i'm just bored.... k, finally, my blog is up... i have 2 wks left to study and here i am... slacking online. as you can see, its not very nicely done up yet... so give me time to improve. haiz, feel so restless, dun feel like studying, feel like eating! where is my food?!! taking so long to get home... anyway, tag me!

haiz... i was planning to do all my work since i ended early on Tuesdays. then I had to smartly find out that the tr had made a mistake and the group that had to hand in the PW file was my grp! ok, -panics- so i had to stay back and do like siao, until 5. Of course 3 hrs wasnt enough. (including lunch, and chi -- sacrificed to do pw) so i have been doing pw until now. which means in total, i did pw for 9 hrs. Shiok rite? wasted all my time! i'm feeling damn hungry now...... 9 hrs of work, i deserve a treat man. dieting is underway, trying to stop my huge appetite from growing even more ( something i have trouble doing). no one reads, so dun expect me to blog so much... its called blogstipation, to quote yiQing. and i dun even know her..... my mind is drained, i am totally exhausted..... no time for anithing. Thats Singapore JC life for u. No life to be exact!...... Dua pui, jason, ahfu.....ss... nothing, just call for fun.... people who add alot of colour to my life :)

hmm, has windsurfing session with the sailors the whole day. i went out with titus initially, to teach him, but we kept getting swept towards the canal wall. so i guess i was sailing more than him cause i kept trying to save us. then later i left him for.... i duno actually.... haha, but we had fun. i was slacking ard when i heard Koh Eng Chee shouting, saying someone was in the canal and he just abandoned his equipment to attempt to save her. i took equipment and sailed over and realised that its was han ying inside. haha, that was quite funny, then came out from the other side of the canal and carried the equipment up the stairs. We proceeded to Suntec and you wont believe what i ate. 1 Zinger burger, 2pcs of chicken, 1 whipped potato, 1 cheese fries and my drink. thats like 1 drink, 1 coleslawand 1 whipped potato short of a buddy meal. And the worse thing was i wasnt super full . haha... i am getting so damn fat lah. i must exercise self control. watched King Arthur. wasnt fantastic but was ok. the girl was chio, thought i cant rememebr her name. Arthur was quite a leader... leading his knights. hmm.... sch sux, alot of work to do, ok, i am going to do it now.... been wasting my time awae...

urlLink My cake urlLink urlLink Me with my cake urlLink urlLink Top: Zhengfu Middle: Kong Jun, Shun Xiang, Jun Feng!, Wee Sern bottom: me urlLink urlLink Zhengfu, kj, ss, me, dua pui, junfeng urlLink urlLink Me and zhengfu after cake smashing urlLink urlLink top: Jason, soon siang, kj bottom: wee sern, me, zhengfu urlLink

Apathy, well I can say your lucky, in some ways. You see Apathy is no emotion, basically you don't care. But that does not make you a bad person. Some of my friends are apathetic and I love them, but it wouldn't hurt to care a little more. Trust me life hurts, most people who are apathetic do it cause they were hurt. But don't worry, life is pain, its also pleasure. Good luck. (please vote) urlLink What Emotion Dominates you? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla

it's official, i'm 17 and its the age when all u do is concentrate on ur studies. after you are 16, you get to watch NC16 show, and when u are 18, M18 shows, legal drinking, clubbing... hahha~, so 17 is in the middle, to get ur JC foundation right. k, thanks to the gang for making my bdae a memorable one. hmm, zj and jQ ah, must have totally forgot aboout my BIG bouquet of flowers... nvm, still glad i cleared my JCTs, scraped thru to be exact. photos coming really soon... stay tuned

My JCTs sucked alot. and i am really stressed from missing school. i just want to try to make everything right. i need to get my better grades..... haiz..... how do i do so much in such a short time? paranoid again..

haiz, was quite irritated with PW cause we couldnt decide on certain things.... took so much of my brain cells away... was looking ard with Dora for stuff, saw a nice red mambo jacket, actually we were doing our survey lah, but then i decided we should slack. haha~... waiting for my hair to dry so i can style it... thats why i am here, upload some photos soon
haha, guess what? my sister's camera went missing so she went looking and found mine!!! yeah~ damn happy now

haha, i have decided, i will lose some weight. i wonder how though.... just came back from shopping with xiuwen and i saw some wonderful things, even gu niang things that i usually dun wear. i would if i were fair and skinny k, but i am the total opposite. haha wishlist wishlist... 1. oakley shades 2. adidas jacket 3. new bag 4. manly watch (metal) 5. MI DIGI CAM (it went missing) ok, it's wishful thinking, cause all are damn ex lah... i just cant wait to go see the skin doctor.... my face is irritating me. how abt more choices? haha~ new list 1. teva or roxy slippers, nothing too girly. i'm a teva7 and reef8 2. Boxers(cartoony, manly, checkered(sp?)) yes i will wear them at home 3. rectangular piggy pillow at taka 4. BIG 'Me to you' bear haha, i shouldnt be asking for presents... evil me! i'm quite sure someone doesnt even know when my bdae is... haha, neva ever heard ani well wishes from him actually.. btw, i've got Gmail. haha. jacqueline.e.tan@gmail.com

10 OF YOUR CLOSEST FRIENDS (not in order) [1] xiuwen, known her since sec1 [2] zhengfu - only got closer this yr [3] jiaqing - since sec2, but only got closer since last yr [4] Dora [5] [6] [7] [8] [9] [10]my life is so sad, i have so little close frens 9 THINGS THAT U REALLY WANT RIGHT NOW [1] lose weight [2] my hair to grow [3] iBook + iPod [4] go shopping [5] clear skin [6] new bag [7] new clothes [8] nice hse [9] a happy and peaceful life 8 IMPORTANT THINGS IN YOUR BAG [1] handphone [2] wallet [3] ezlink [4] wax [5] nets [6] specs? [7] [8] 7 THINGS IN YOUR ROOM [1] bed [2] dust [3] aircon [4] stuffed toys [5] cupboard [6] things i duno that exist [7] glow in the dark stars 6 OF YOUR FAVE MOVIES [1] My sassy girl [2] the day after tmr [3] Shrek [4] Green mile [5] Finding Nemo [6] duplex 5 OF YOUR FAVORITE FOOD [1] hotdogs [2] pizza [3] junk [4] hotplate tofu [5] beef 4 THINGS YOU ATE/DRINK TODAY [1] beef with kailan [2] pineapple rice [3] prawn patty(sp?) [4] water 3 THINGS YOU COULDN'T LIVE WITHOUT [1] my hse/home [2] money(face it, its a fact of life) [3] 5 senses + emotions 2 THINGS YOU USUALLY READ(not ranked) [1] books [2] magazines 1 PERSON YOU CANT LIVE WITHOUT [1] my father - both earthly and Godly

haha, my fren just said:"how you put on so much in just 2/3 wks?", and i was like yeah, sure, it's easy. haha, i can easily put on the weight; just stuff myself with food and can drinks. thats easy. but i cant afford the weight lah BUT, decided it would be better if i could stop doing that and actually lose some weight. ok, it's 4 july, and xw's bdae is in 4 days. i wont be able to spend it with her, so sad. this past week hasn been going well for me. first, whit spots, lost my booties, gloves and lifevest. had a bad hair cut, swollen eyes, insufficent rest, training. increase in weight(i tink so, haven weighed). aniwae, i'm such a paraniod, lazy, freaking bummer. and i know this isn't how i should be living my life.... i need to move on, get my engine started and get myself out of this slack/stone mood. ok, i can still do that but not as much. life's pretty stagnant ard here. very boring....will update again on my results.... prob be pretty bad...
had a hair cut, not exactly satisfied with it... yah, doesnt look good... examns are over, but i have to wake up early to meet the tr at 8am! wasting my freaking time

hmm, my batch of sailors are weird... they ask for training, and seem a lil quiet. compared to the yr 2s, who are so hyper and comical. well, just came back from studying with titus and zfu. we spend time doing some stupid qn that was so easy and we all felt stupid after that. haha... want to see fireworks? Anson's favourites. well, i kinda like it now also, esp when seen at close range. it must be big, cause i like to see it BIG. haha~ urlLink fireworks! urlLink urlLink this is clearer urlLink urlLink smokey------- urlLink urlLink final shot! red is a nice colour :) urlLink oh yah, i walked all ard orchard barefooted cause my slippers broke*hint*.... ppl stared at me like i was some kind of freak and attention seeker. Happy 39th Birthday Singapore....! i know this entry is very... fragmented.... hahha, its just random thoughts
urlLink before i ballooned up urlLink to clarify, my name is on the board, i just missed it, it was on another sheet. hee~
hmm, whats wrong with my blood? how come i'm not on the list of successful blood donors?

MAKING LOVE OUT OF NOTHING AT ALL (Air Supply) I know just how to whisper And I know just how to cry I know just where I find the answers And I know just how to lie I know just how to fake it And I know just how to scheme I know just when to face the truth And then I know just when to dream And I know just where I touch you And I know just what to prove I know when to pull you closer And I know when to let you loose And I know the night is fading And I know the time’s gonna fly And I’m never gonna tell you everything I gotta tell you But I know I’ve got to give it a try And I know the roads to riches And I know the ways to pain I know all the rules and then I know how to break’em And then I always know the name of the game But I don’t know how to leave you And I’ll never let you fall And I don’t know how you do it Making love out of nothing at all Making love Out of nothing at all (x6) Everytime I see you, well the rays of the sun are all Streaming through the waves in your hair And every star in the sky is taking aim at your eyes Like a spotlight The beating of my heart is a drum and it’s lost And it’s looking for a rhythm like you You can take the darkness from the deep of the night And turn it to a beacon burning endlessly bright I gotta follow it ‘cause everything I know Well, it’s nothing ‘till I give it to you I can make the runner stumble I can make the final block And I can make every tackle at the sound of the whistle And I can make all the stadiums rock I can make tonight forever Or I can make it disappear by the dawn And I can make you every promise that’s ever been made And I can make all your demons be gone But I’m never gonna make it without you Do you really wanna see me crawl ? And I’m never gonna make it like you do Making love out of nothing at all Making love Out of nothing at all...

no more pretence. i'm just going to be me. tell me i'm living in my own world. i'm sick of being nice to ppl.... i hate being bossed ard. esp by someone who has been doing it for a long time. i hate letting myself be afftected by small details.... let me live my life the way i want.... let me grow as a person, not as ur small kid that will never grow up. dun get me wrong, my parents are nice ppl. its not them i'm referring to... just leave me to destroy myself.....
